original_text: They brought grain to you from Shihor region in Egypt. You received crops that had grown beside the Nile river. Tyre became an important city where traders from many nations came.
korean_text: 시홀의 곡식 곧 나일의 추수를 큰 물로 수송하여 들였으니 열국의 시장이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: They brought grain to you from Shihor region
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 시호르 지역에서 너에게 곡식을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: that had grown beside the Nile river
where traders from many nations came
